verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, What is the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* more than any \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \add or than\add* a \w branch|strong="H2156"\w* which is among the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*?

Shall \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* be \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* thereof to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* any \w work|strong="H4399"\w*? or will \add men\add* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* a \w pin|strong="H3489"\w* of it to \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* any \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* thereon?

Behold, it is \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* for \w fuel|strong="H0402"\w*; the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w devoureth|strong="H0398"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* the \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of it, and the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of it is \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*. Is it \w meet|strong="H6743"\w* for \add any\add* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*?\f + \fr 15.4 \ft Is it…: Heb. Will it prosper?\f*

Behold, when it was \w whole|strong="H8549"\w*, it was \w meet|strong="H6213"\w* for no \w work|strong="H4399"\w*: how much less shall it be \w meet|strong="H6213"\w* yet for \add any\add* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, when the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* it, and it is \w burned|strong="H2787"\w*?\f + \fr 15.5 \ft meet: Heb. made fit\f*

¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; As the \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* among the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*, which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* for \w fuel|strong="H0402"\w*, so will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And I will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against them; they shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \add one\add* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \add another\add* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* them; and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I \w set|strong="H7760"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against them.

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, because they have \w committed|strong="H4603"\w* a \w trespass|strong="H4604"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 15.8 \ft committed…: Heb. trespassed a trespass\f*
